title: Blended instructional design for data-driven second language writing proficiency enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Second Language Writing Experience and Writing Instruction Experience in Educational Settings
context.additional_context: A smartphone-based simplified learning environment for pre-service and in-service teachers, emphasizing continuous feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners will analyze structural deficiencies in second-language texts using corpus tools.
Learners will revise and improve written work at least twice using metacognitive strategies (self-checking/revision) and collaborative strategies.
Learners will navigate corpus-based materials in mobile environments to correct over 80% of lexical and grammatical errors.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
